0100010110111100 0010001101110101 0 -> sum: 0110100100110001, cout: 0

0101001001011000 1110101101001111 1 -> sum: 0011110110101000, cout: 1
1110001010000000 0100010010001100 1 -> sum: 0010011100001101, cout: 1
1111100110110111 1101000001001001 0 -> sum: 1100101000000000, cout: 1
0001000011010011 1110011010110001 1 -> sum: 1111011110000101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
